thread.title: Nikki C

author: Nikki C
title: Nikki C
text:
Echoing most of my fellow reviewers here on Trust Pilot (and boy do I wish I came here earlier), my company currently holds an extremely negative review of Monster.com based on the sheer poor quality of candidates that they sent over. What's worse is that I have politely written to ask for a refund to no avail (how can you not afford to pay back unhappy customers????) Instead, I am given a "complimentary refresh" to give my posting better traffic at a higher position. No! This is not what I want at all! I am sick of wasting my time on unqualified candidates.
To all employers looking to hire: we posted the exact same listing on Indeed.com and received not only 3 times as many candidates as we did on Monster but more than 50% of them were qualified (compared to the 0 hit rate we had at Monster).
